scripts.dev:admin: lerna run clean --scope '@comet/admin*' && dotenv -c -- dev-pm start @comet-admin
scripts.dev:cms: lerna run clean --scope '@comet/cms-*' --scope '@comet/blocks-*' && yarn build:admin:skippable && dotenv -c -- dev-pm start @cms
scripts.dev:cms:api: lerna run clean --scope '@comet/cms-api' --scope '@comet/blocks-api' && dotenv -c -- dev-pm start @cms-api
scripts.dev:cms:admin: lerna run clean --scope '@comet/cms-admin' --scope '@comet/blocks-admin' && yarn build:admin:skippable && dotenv -c -- dev-pm start @cms-admin
scripts.dev:cms:site: lerna run clean --scope '@comet/cms-site' && dotenv -c -- dev-pm start @cms-site
scripts.dev:demo: yarn build:admin:skippable && yarn build:cms:skippable && dotenv -c -- dev-pm start @demo
scripts.dev:demo:admin: yarn build:admin:skippable && yarn build:cms:admin:skippable && dotenv -c -- dev-pm start @demo-admin
scripts.build:admin:skippable: test -f packages/admin/admin/lib/index.d.ts && echo 'Skipping Admin build' || $npm_execpath build:admin
scripts.build:cms:admin:skippable: test -f packages/admin/cms-admin/lib/index.d.ts && echo 'Skipping CMS Admin build' || $npm_execpath build:cms:admin
scripts.build:cms:api:skippable: test -f packages/api/cms-api/lib/index.d.ts && echo 'Skipping CMS API build' || $npm_execpath build:cms:api
scripts.build:cms:site:skippable: test -f packages/site/cms-site/lib/index.d.ts && echo 'Skipping CMS Site build' || $npm_execpath build:cms:site
scripts.build:cms:skippable: test -f packages/admin/cms-admin/lib/index.d.ts && echo 'Skipping CMS build' || $npm_execpath build:cms
